title: How To Live in A Haunted Home
description:
You've seen her on Paranormal 911 and Haunted Hospitals among others! Author and paranormal researcher Morgan Knudsen joins me to discuss her new book 'Teaching the Living: From Heartbreak to Happiness in a Haunted Home'. 
Co-founding “Entityseeker Paranormal Research & Investigations”, award-winning investigator Morgan Knudsen's 17 years of experience and knowledge have included co-creating the unique investigative program, 'Teaching the Living'. Subsequently, she has been featured on, and hosted, numerous networks and TV shows around the globe (The Discovery Channel, "A Haunting", "Paranormal 911", Haunted Hospitals", T&E, Travel Channel, Destination America, CBC, CTV, among others). She has also served as a guest professor instructing the 'Teaching the Living' program in psychology and social work classes at many of Canada's post-secondary institutions. With an incredible success rate, Teaching The Living is becoming the number one tool in dealing with people and hauntings in Canada, the United States, and the Netherlands. Requiring people to examine their behaviour, state of mind, and to speak their own truth; Teaching the Living asks the hard questions, examining possible paranormal phenomenon in an honest and effective way, to affect lasting change.
Do you enjoy paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.
Seven - Our podcast for the jaded ones that need wicked stories in their lives!
